titles.title: Stop Tax Penalties on American Hostages Act of 2024
Stop Tax Penalties on American Hostages Act of 2024

A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to postpone tax deadlines and reimburse paid late fees for United States nationals who are unlawfully or wrongfully detained or held hostage abroad, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary:
Stop Tax Penalties on American Hostages Act of 2024
This bill postpones certain tax filing deadlines for U.S. nationals and their spouses who are unlawfully or wrongfully detained abroad or held hostage abroad. It also allows for a refund and abatement of penalties and fines paid by detained individuals.
